name: A. Business trip
statement:
What joy! Petya’s parents went on a business trip for the whole year and
the playful kid is left all by himself. Petya got absolutely happy. He
jumped on the bed and threw pillows all day long, until... Today Petya
opened the cupboard and found a scary note there. His parents had left
him with duties: he should water their favourite flower all year, each
day, in the morning, in the afternoon and in the evening. "Wait a
second!" thought Petya. He know for a fact that if he fulfills the
parents’ task in the -th () month of the year, then the flower will grow
by centimeters, and if he doesn’t water the flower in the -th month,
then the flower won’t grow this month. Petya also knows that try as he
might, his parents won’t believe that he has been watering the flower if
it grows strictly less than by centimeters. Help Petya choose the
minimum number of months when he will water the flower, given that the
flower should grow no less than by centimeters.
